meta.description: Language labels for database tables/fields belonging to extension 'aux_newsmailer'

languageKey.label: Piwik Archive Cron Job
Run the tasks shipped with piwik.org
method not found - perhaps not implemented
Update Assistent
There several assistents which help you to keep your piwikinstallation working available in update wizard
Updateassistent

Prefix for Database. Please note, saving causes TYPO3 to try to move the tables to the database you provided, if that fails move is canceld and Piwik will not work. Empty field means Piwikdata is stored in TYPO3 database - don't use compare whitout knowing what you do ... The dot is automatically added just provide a databasename{value}.{tablename}

EXPERIMENTAL independent mode: Enable independent mode of piwikintegration, that means, the JS is rendered without additional extensions, if not enabled an additional extension is needed to render the fe output for piwik - it's suggested to use EXT:piwik for FE-Rendering
EXPERIMENTAL scheduler task: Enable EXPERIMENTAL scheduler task integration, don't enable prior 4.3
Debugging of scheduler task:Enable heavy logging for the scheduler task - should be off in production environments, don't enable prior 4.3

Set settings to respect german data privacy act, the base for these settings is the document of the the ULDSH. https://www.datenschutzzentrum.de/tracking/piwik/20110315-webanalyse-piwik.pdf
Fixes table rename bug

Update Assistent
Im Update Asssitenten sind einige Hilfsmittel, um die Pflege der Piwikinstallation zu vereinfachen.
Aktualisierungsassistent
Prefix für Datenbank. Das Ändern dieses Wertes verursacht einen verschiebe Versuch der Datenbanktabellen.
EXPERIMENTAL independent mode: bindet den Tracking code ohne weitere Extension ein, denoch wird die Nutzung von EXT:piwik für das FE-Rendering empfohlen
EXPERIMENTAL scheduler task: Aktiviere EXPERIMENTAL scheduler task Integration, aktiviere nicht vor TYPOO 4.3
Debug scheduler task:aktiviere aggressives loggen, nicht vor TYPO3 4.3 aktivieren
Umbenennen, tx_piwikintegration_* in user_piwikintegration_*

truncate piwik access Tabelle

Aktiviere Einstellungen, um den deutschen Datenschutz zu respektieren.Die Grundlage für die Einstellungen ist das folgende Dokument des ULDSH. https://www.datenschutzzentrum.de/tracking/piwik/20110315-webanalyse-piwik.pdf
Löst das Problem der umbenannten Tabellen.
